name: Jonathan Sahagun
text: The worst part for me is how they treat heavy users like criminals and use this as a convenient excuse to cover up their network's deficiencies. "The only people who are affected by this are people who use BitTorrent to download illegal content. So you shouldn't need to worry, riiight? (wink, wink, smirk)" Unfortunately, Globe seems to still be stuck in the early 2000s.
